1.1.5.en: turn on/off camera (EufyCam pan&tilt will turn its lens) | Set guard mode (Home, Away, Disarmed, Schedule) |Add devices and use them in flows. (on/off) |Get notifications based on detection modes for specific devices. (Motion, Face, Sound and Doorbell Press)
